column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kenny - Thank you for the excellent review. We greatly appreciate your kind words. I'm glad you received good service and that you were pleased with our fare. Given the sharp increase in ramen shops in Houston
column2: I'm glad we were able to provide you with favorable options. Again
column3: we are grateful for your patronage and kind words
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
